thread.title: X-23 Unleashed in New Logan Photos
thread.title_full: X-23 Unleashed in New Logan Photos

author: Spencer Perry
title: X-23 Unleashed in New Logan Photos
text:
SHARE X-23 Unleashed in New Logan Photos 
Following director James Mangold’s confirmation of the film’s R-rating , four new photos from Logan have debuted online (via Empire ) and feature the title hero along with Charles Xavier and newcomer, X-23! Check them out in the gallery below. 
We also got a chance to watch the first 35 minutes of the film and interview director James Mangold. You can check the report and interview by clicking here . 
Set in the near future, the film follows a weary Logan as he cares for an ailing Professor X in a hideout on the Mexican border. But Logan’s attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are up-ended when a young mutant arrives, being pursued by dark forces. 
Starring Hugh Jackman, Sir Patrick Stewart , Dafne Keen, Eriq La Salle, Stephen Merchant, Elise Neal and Elizabeth Rodriguez, Logan is coming to theaters on March 3, 2017. Directed by James Mangold and scripted by David James Kelly, the new film will mark the ninth (and said to be final) time that Jackman has played the Marvel Comics character on the big screen.
